words.source: H2734 charah, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'was kindled', ESV 'was kindled', NASB 'burned'
H639 ʾaph, noun ms; KJV 'the anger', ESV 'the anger', NASB 'the anger' — idiom: charah ʾaph = 'anger burned'
H3068 YHWH, proper noun divine; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the LORD'
H4872 Mosheh, proper noun + preposition be; KJV 'against Moses', ESV 'against Moses', NASB 'against Moses'
H559 ʾamar, Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV/ESV/NASB 'said'
H3808 loʾ, negative particle + interrogative he; KJV 'Is not', ESV 'Is there not', NASB 'Is there not'
H175 ʾAharon, proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Aaron'
H251 ʾach, noun ms construct + 2ms suffix; KJV 'thy brother', ESV/NASB 'your brother'
H3881 Lewi, gentilic adjective + article he; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the Levite'
H3045 yadaʿ, Qal qatal 1cs; KJV 'I know', ESV 'I know', NASB 'I know'
H3588 ki, conjunction; KJV/ESV/NASB 'that'
H1696 dabar, Piel infinitive absolute; used for emphasis before finite verb; KJV 'well', ESV 'well', NASB 'fluently' — part of intensifying construction dabber yedabber
H1696 dabar, Piel yiqtol 3ms; KJV 'he can speak', ESV 'he can speak', NASB 'he speaks'
H1931 huʾ, independent pronoun 3ms; KJV/ESV/NASB 'he'
H1571 gam, adverb + waw conjunction; KJV 'And also', ESV 'Moreover' (implied), NASB 'And furthermore'
H2009 hinneh, interjection; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold' (implied), NASB 'behold' (implied)
H1931 huʾ, independent pronoun 3ms; KJV/ESV/NASB 'he'
H3318 yatsaʾ, Qal active participle ms; KJV 'cometh forth', ESV 'is coming out', NASB 'is coming out'
H7125 qirʾah, noun fs + preposition le + 2ms suffix; KJV 'to meet thee', ESV/NASB 'to meet you'
H7200 raʾah, Qal weqatal 3ms + 2ms suffix; KJV 'when he seeth thee', ESV 'when he sees you', NASB 'when he sees you'
H8055 samach, Qal weqatal 3ms; KJV 'he will be glad', ESV 'he will be glad', NASB 'he will be glad'
H3820 lev, noun ms + preposition be + 3ms suffix; KJV/ESV/NASB 'in his heart'
